description: Non-material amendments to planning permission reference 21/6284/S73 dated 31/03/22 for 'Variation of planning permission reference 21/0263/FUL dated 13/10/2021 for 'Full demolition of the existing building (use class C3) and construction of a new building of part 4 storey and part 6 storey (5 above ground) with the uppermost storey of both elements providing accommodation within the roof. New building to provide residential accommodation (use class C3) with associated communal areas, amenity space, refuse/recycling storage and cycle storage. Provision of off-street car parking spaces at ground and basement level accessed via ramped access. Amendments include changes to the wording of condition 15 (Plant Noise Emissions) to read 'The rating level of noise emitted from any normally operating plant hereby approved and installed in the development shall be; At least 5dB(A) below the representative background level, as measured from any point 1 metre outside the window of any habitable room of a neighbouring residential property during the daytime (07:00 - 23:00). Equal to or below the representative background level, as measured from any point 1 metre outside the window of any habitable room of a neighbouring residential property at night (23:00 - 07:00)'
